page.description: Get the differences between two properties, store in difference pointer.

argument.name: first
argument.description: A dot variable containing various sub-elements.

argument.name: second
argument.description: A dot variable containing various sub-elements.

argument.name: difference
argument.description: A dot variable containing the difference between Property1 and Property2.

page.discussion: The *PROPERTY_DIFFERENCE() function creates an array with the difference between two property strings.
page.example: prop1.a = 1 prop1.b = 2 prop1.c = 3 prop1.e = 1 dim prop1.f[2] as C prop1.f[1] = "Cian" prop2.a = 2 prop2.b = 2 prop2.d = 2 prop2.e = 1 dim prop2.f[2] as C prop2.f[1] = "Eavan" dim diff.dummy as C *property_difference(prop1, prop2, diff) ui_msg_box("Diff",property_to_string(diff))
